p.strong: On Wednesday, April 16, 2020, Governor Murphy issued an Executive Order closing all schools through Friday, May 15, 2020.

span.p: As a result of this order, the Morris Hills Regional School District will remain closed until the order is lifted and we receive clearance from local and state agencies to return back to school. Toward that end, both Morris Knolls High School and Morris Hills High School will remain closed and will continue with virtual home instruction through Friday, May 15, 2020.

All school activities and athletic practices and contests remain canceled until further notice. We will reassess the situation and provide a status update on May 15, 2020 to all members of the Morris Hills Regional District.

div.p: The Morris Hills Regional School District affirms its responsibility to ensure equal educational opportunity to all students in its schools regardless of ancestry, color, creed, national origin, race, religious, gender, or socioeconomic status or disability.
